description:
gFlags is still used by nova/smoketests/flags.py.

We should record the dependency in tools/test-requires and backport that to grizzly.


For Havana, it would be nice to move from gFlags to openstack.common.cfg to match the rest of Nova/Openstack.
title: gflags used in Smoketests

comments.content:
gFlags is still used by nova/smoketests/flags.py.

We should record the dependency in tools/test-requires and backport that to grizzly.


For Havana, it would be nice to move from gFlags to openstack.common.cfg to match the rest of Nova/Openstack.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rconradharris

Fix proposed to branch: master

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/27852

Branch:    master

commit ca599a877fa5a086d39658847f0e12abd8f744ee
Author: Rick Harris <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Apr 30 21:52:45 2013 +0000

    Record smoketest dependency on gFlags
    
    The smoketests currently have a dependency on gFlags. Long term, this should
    be converted to use openstack.common.cfg; but in the near term, we should
    record this existing dependency.
    
    Fixes bug 1174953
    
    Change-Id: I465abc6a4a2e8f7ebd1fe70ad239c760960a82ed
